1:
Yahweh, rescue me from the wicked;\q preserve me from violent men.
\q
2:
They plan evil in their hearts;\q they cause battles every day.
\q
3:
Their tongues wound like serpents;\q vipers' poison is on their lips.
\qs Selah\qs*


\q
4:
Keep me from the hands of the wicked, Yahweh;\q preserve me from violent men
\q who plan to knock me over.
\q
5:
The proud have set a trap for me;\q they have spread a net;
\q they have set a snare for me.
\qs Selah\qs*


\q
6:
I said to Yahweh, "You are my God;\q listen to my cries for mercy."
\q
7:
Yahweh, my Lord, you are powerfully able to save me;\q you shield my head in the day of battle.
\q
8:
Yahweh, do not grant the desires of the wicked;\q do not let their plots succeed.
\qs Selah\qs*


\q
9:
Those who surround me raise their heads;\q let the mischief of their own lips cover them.
\q
10:
Let burning coals fall on them;\q throw them into the fire,
\q into bottomless pits, never more to rise.
\q
11:
May men of tongues not be made secure on the earth;\q may evil hunt down the violent man to strike him dead.


\q
12:
I know that Yahweh will judge in favor of the afflicted,\q and that he will give justice to the needy.
\q
13: Surely the righteous people will give thanks to your name;\q the upright people will live in your presence.
